document.full_text: -sharif, afghanistan  - an afghan border policeman shot dead two foreign soldiers on a training mission in north afghanistan on monday, a senior official said, the latest in a series of apparent "rogue" attacks by afghan security forces on their mentors.
document.title: afghan policeman kills two foreign soldiers: officials
lines_and_colors: -sharif, afghanistan  - an afghan border policeman shot dead two foreign soldiers on a training mission in north afghanistan on monday, a senior official said, the latest in a series of apparent "rogue" attacks by afghan security forces on their mentors.
